TextBlock.Text: 亚罗： Oh... hello. Hypothesis: Our failure with the Sun Station brought you here to ridicule me.
<color=brown>斯拜尔</color>: Uh... Hypothesis: it would be beneficial to you both if neither of you called each other anymore.
曼陀罗：I... 亚罗, are you alright? 亚罗? Hey, wait!
<color=brown>斯拜尔</color>: Oh, see you later, 亚罗! Don’t worry, we’ll figure it out! I believe in us! ...So, 曼陀罗, what is the true intent of your call?
曼陀罗：Uh, th-there’s a comet coming! And it’s filled with-!
<color=brown>斯拜尔</color>: Oh, you observed the comet too? You and me both! We’ve actually already sent a shuttle to go check it out. But thanks anyway, 曼陀罗.
<color=brown>斯拜尔</color>: Well, I’m gonna catch up to亚罗to see if he’s alright. See ya around! Don’t be a stranger, now!
